properties.name: Good Food Market
properties.description: The Good Food Market, sponsored by CDPHP, is a unique shopping experience offering farm-fresh food and goods from New York businesses at affordable prices.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You got groceries to make healthy meals for the week.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll have to find food some other way this week.

properties.name: Troy City Clerk
properties.description: The Office of the City Clerk maintains the records of the Legislative Branch of Government and provides administrative support for the City Council.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You paid your bills and can rest easy for the month.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, hopefully they don't shut off the heat.

properties.name: Bank of America Financial Center
properties.description: Whatever your needs, a Bank of America financial center with walk-up ATM in Troy can help. Make an appointment to speak with one of our specialists or take advantage of the many banking services our ATMs have to offer.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You paid your rent and can rest easy for the month.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, hopefully your landlord won't kick you out.

properties.name: Hatchet Hardware of Downtown Troy
properties.description: Locally owned and operated. Located in downtown Troy, New Yorks historic business district.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You got some supplies so you can finally fix your sink.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll just fix your sink another time.

properties.name: Caprara's Auto Body
properties.description: Capraras Auto Body Shop Inc. was established in 1967 and continues to provide the highest quality collision repair. We have repaired all vehicle makes and models.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You took care of your car and got gas for the week.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, maybe you'll ride your bike this week instead.

properties.name: Goodway Gourmet
properties.description: Goodway Gourmet Bakery isn't just a name; it's a legacy. Established years ago in the bustling streets of Troy, New York, our bakery has been the cornerstone of many celebrations.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You got a yummy slice of cake.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you have some treats at home.

properties.name: Organa Food & Juice Bar
properties.description: Located at River Street Market Fresh juices with plant based meals and healthy snack choices.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You enjoyed a yummy treat with friends.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll see your friends another day.

properties.name: Arts Center of the Capital Region
properties.description: The mission of the Arts Center of the Capital Region is to enable people to create and engage in the arts.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You took a fun dance class and learned some new moves.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you can always learn to dance from YouTube.

properties.name: Trap Sole Kitchen
properties.description: Luxury Fashion Boutique located in the business district of Downtown Troy, NY

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You got some cool new kicks.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll ask for new shoes for your birthday.

properties.name: First Choice Caribbean
properties.description: Authentic Jamaican food & Caribbean vegan cuisine

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You're full, but you're down $20.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll cook dinner at home tonight.

properties.name: Forever Royal Hair Studio
properties.description: Forever Royal Haircare provides you with natural hair products made from organic ingredients.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You got a fresh style, but now you're down $30.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll wait until next month for a new style, but you saved some cash.

properties.name: Troy Threads
properties.description: Locally owned boutique and consignment shop offering the latest trends at affordable prices.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You helped the environment, and earned some extra cash.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll save your clothes for next season.

properties.name: Troy Youth Association Inc.
properties.description: Licensed after school program serving low to moderate income families in the community. We also offer a teen program and traveling summer camp.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! Writing this off on your taxes will save you money at the end of the year!
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll try to donate next year.

properties.name: Riverfront Park
properties.description: Troy Riverfront Park is a 4.4 acre waterfront located in the heart of Troy, New York.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You had a nice walk and earned some extra cash!
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you can always walk the dogs another day.

properties.name: Can Stop Redemption Center and Groceries
properties.description: Melissa and Bill Crandall started Can Stop to do their part in making our world a 'Greener Friendly Environment' for future generations to come.

taskInfo.yesMessage: Nice! You helped the environment, and earned some extra cash.
taskInfo.noMessage: It's ok, you'll save your bottle for next time.
